name: GreatNeck 12" Compass Saw - Precision Saw for Wood & Plastic, Drywall Cutting
short_description: Get It Done Fast: This drywall saw tool is designed for curve cuts and other working, carpentry, and hobby applications; Make quick and precise cuts across a variety of materials
Multiple Materials: This hand saw for wood, plastic, drywall, and non-ferrous metals features an induction hardened, tri-bevel tooth design that stays sharp longer
Strong as Steel: To keep this wood saw strong through all your heavy-duty jobs, the alloy steel blade maintains its durability and corrosion resistance across a variety of environments
Comfort Grip: You never have to worry about sore hands with this wood cutter thanks to the anti-slip comfort handle that reduces hand fatigue
Compact Cutting: Cutting and carving jobs may require you to reach into small or obstructed areas; The blade on this drywall saw knife is ideal for cutting in tight spaces
product_description: When you need quick, refined cuts, you need the GreatNeck 74032 12 Inch Compass Saw. No matter where you go, you can use this compact saw. It is designed for curve cuts and other working, carpentry, and hobby applications on softer woods, plastic, drywall, and non-ferrous metals. You’ll make beautiful cuts thanks to the induction hardened, tri-bevel tooth blade design, which holds its edge longer. These teeth deliver faster and more efficient cutting across a variety of materials. Even when faced with tight or obstructed areas, these hand saws get the job done. The blade allows easy access into small spaces. Use this saw for as many jobs as you need without worrying about damage. These saws feature an alloy steel blade that provides both durability and rust resistance. With the amount of time you spend working a saw, you need a design that keeps your hands safe. This saw is equipped with an anti-slip comfort handle that keeps your hands in place and reduces fatigue. To get the job done right the first time, this GreatNeck 74032 12 Inch Compass Saw is the ideal choice.

name: CRAFTSMAN Hand Saw, 15-Inch (CMHT20880)
short_description: FAST & CLEAN CUTS: The hand saw has an exclusive tooth geometry for a fast clean cut
DURABILITY: The handsaw features induction hardened teeth for a long lasting sharpness
COMFORT: Ergonomically designed bi-material handle for comfort and control
SQUARE & MITER: Handle offers a square & miter feature with 45-degree and 90-degree angles
product_description: There are saws for the most applications and job. Select from 15-inch and 20-inch hand saws, a 10-inch fine-finish hand saw for cutting wood, plastic, and laminate, 12-inch hacksaw, and for those precision cuts, an adjustable miter box and clamping miter box both complete with saws.

name: Shark 10-2204 Dowel/Dovetail/Detail Saw
short_description: 24 Teeth per-inch for exceptionally fine cuts
Cuts dowel and plugs flush
Very narrow kerf for minimal stock removal
Ideal for dovetails and other joinery cuts
One year warranty

name: Lynx Garlick Taytools Thomas Flinn British 24” Rip Saw with Taper Ground Blade, Stained Beech Handle 4.5 TPI Filed for Rip Cutting
short_description: This saw is made by Thomas Flinn of Sheffield England the last traditional saw and plane maker in the UK.
Saw plate is made from Sheffield allow spring steel and taper ground providing a good balance of edge durability and ease of sharpening.
The saw plate is taper-ground and gets progressively thinner (approx. 0.005 inches) from the teeth to the back of the saw. This greatly reduced binding in the cuts.
Handle is stained European Beech with brass button screws
24” saw plate has 4.5 TPI and filed for rip cutting
product_description: Thomas Flinn is the oldest remaining traditional hand saw maker in Sheffield, England. Thomas Flinn produces an extensive range of saws under famous traditional brands like Pax, Garlick, Lynx, William Greaves and Dorchester. This saw is co-branded Lynx / Taytools. Thomas Flinn is known for making reasonably-priced, professional-quality western-style hand saws. This saw is made from world-renowned Sheffield allow spring steel providing a good balance of edge durability and ease of sharpening. The saw plate is taper-ground and gets progressively thinner (approx. 0.005 inches) from the teeth to the back of the saw. This greatly reduced binding in the cuts. It comes with a handle made from stained European Beech and has brass button screws. The handle is attractive and comfortable in use. The 24" blade has 4.5 TPI and is filed for rip cutting. Saw is hand-sharpened before leaving the factiory. This saw can be resharpened.

name: CRAFTSMAN Mitre Saw, 12-Inch Saw & Clamping Box (CMHT20600)
short_description: ACCURACY: The hand miter saw has cam-shaped pins twist and lock with honeycomb base to secure work for accurate cuts
MULTIPLE CUT ANGLES: Cuts mitres on 45-degree and 90-degree angles and face angles on 45 degree and 22.5 degree for octagonal shapes
Extended lip on base holds mitre box in place while cutting and a built-in saw stop helps prevent cutting into mitre box
CONVENIENT STORAGE: Molded-in storage bins to hold cam pins and pencil
product_description: You'll find saws for multiple applications. Select from 15-inch and 20-inch hand saws, a 10-inch fine-finish hand saw for cutting wood, plastic, and laminate, 12-inch hacksaw, and for those precision cuts, an adjustable miter box and clamping miter box both complete with saws.

name: IRWIN Tools ProTouch Coping Saw (2014400), Blue & Yellow
short_description: High-speed steel coping saw blades cut through most materials with ease
A Flat-Bar frame and DuraSteel pins on this coping saw provide durable use
This coping saw has an ergonomic ProTouch handle to give added comfort
17-pt. tooth count
5-1/2" frame depth and 6-1/2" blade length
High-speed steel coping saw blades cut through most materials with ease
A Flat-Bar frame and DuraSteel pins on this coping saw provide durable use
This coping saw has an ergonomic ProTouch handle to give added comfort
17-pt. tooth count
5-1/2" frame depth and 6-1/2" blade length
product_description: This IRWIN ProTouch Coping Saw has a Flat-Bar frame and DuraSteel pins to provide lasting use. The ProTouch handle features an ergonomic triangular shape to provide comfort during long sessions. The high-speed steel coping saw blades help make quick work of most materials.

name: Lynx Thomas Flinn Taytools British 10 inch Tenon Saw with Stained Beech Handle 15 TPI and Filed for Crosscutting
short_description: This saw is made by Thomas Flinn of Sheffield England the last traditional saw and plane maker in the UK.
Saw plate is made from Sheffield allow spring steel and taper ground providing a good balance of edge durability and ease of sharpening.
The saw plate is held straight and true by a thick, solid brass spine. The folded brass back means the blade is held under tension offering excellent rigidity and balance.
Handle is stained European Beech with brass button screws
10 inch saw plate has 15 TPI and filed for crosscutting. Maximum depth of cut is 2-3/8 inches.
product_description: Thomas Flinn is the oldest remaining traditional hand saw maker in Sheffield, England. Thomas Flinn produces an extensive range of saws under famous traditional brands like Pax, Lynx, William Greaves and Dorchester. This saw is co-branded Lynx / Taytools. Thomas Flinn is known for making reasonably-priced, professional-quality western-style hand saws. This saw is made from world-renowned Sheffield allow spring steel. providing a good balance of edge durability and ease of sharpening. The saw plate is held straight and true by a thick, solid brass spine. The folded brass back means the blade is held under tension offering excellent rigidity and balance. The weight of the brass back aids the fine cutting ability of this saw. It comes with a handle made from stained European Beech and has brass button screws. The handle is attractive and comfortable in use. The 10 inch blade has a maximum depth of cut of 2-3/8 inches. It has 15 TPI and is filed for crosscutting making it perfect for cutting tenon cheeks. The saw is hand sharpened before leaving the factory and can be resharpened.

name: BAHCO 2600-22-XT-HP 22 Inch Ergo Superior Handsaw with XT Toothing Fine Cut
short_description: Hard point saw with substantially thicker blade which results in less power-consuming side vibrations
Bevel ground teeth on thick blade for height precision and straight cutting with exceptionally good stability
Screwed, one piece two-component ergo handle
Handle placement provides even distribution of power along the tooth line
Comes with reusable plastic patented tooth protector
product_description: Hard point saw with substantially thicker blade which results in less power-consuming side vibrations. Bevel ground teeth on thick blade for height precision and straight cutting with exceptionally good stability. Screwed, one piece two-component ergo handle. Handle placement provides even distribution of power along the tooth line. Comes with reusable plastic patented tooth protector

name: Corona Tools 13-Inch RazorTOOTH Pruning Saw | Tree Saw Designed for Single-Hand Use | Curved Blade Hand Saw | Cuts Branches up to 7" in Diameter | RS 7120
short_description: IDEAL FOR LARGE BRANCHES: 13 inch blade ideal for cutting 7 inch diameter branches
INNOVATIVE ERGONOMIC HANDLE: Pistol grip and finger hook provides efficiencies for Professional Arborists
3 SIDED RAZOR TEETH FOR EFFICIENT CUTTING: Triple ground teeth cut more material at greater angles per saw pass
LONG SERVICE LIFE: Impulse-hardened teeth extend durability of the saw sharpness
HIGH-CARBON STEEL BLADE: Made of Japanese SK5 steel with exceptional hardness and durability for a long-lasting tool
product_description: RazorTOOTH Saw® technology removes up to 2x more material per pull stroke than conventional blades for extremely fast and efficient cutting. Non-slip pistol grip handle with finger hook. Curved 13 inch blade.

name: 30-Inch Western Log Saw - For Wood Cutting, Lumber, or Timber - Professional Arborist Hand Wood Saw - Branch Cutter Pruning for Trimming, Gardening, or Logs by Kings County Tools
short_description: 30-INCH HANDSAW - This perfectly sized wood hand saw features the same crosscut tooth pattern as larger lumberjack saws to work just as fast as a 2-person saw, but designed for one person to comfortably use this hand saw for tree cutting.

QUALITY AMERICAN DESIGN - This wood saw hand tool is designed by a California firm that makes professional arborist tools, with a comfortable wood handhold for a secure grip. Leave the chainsaw in the garage with this manual pruning and lumber saw.

HEAVY DUTY 4-TPI BLADE - This beefy handsaw for wood features a 30-inch alloy steel blade with 4 TPI and superior sharpness. The tree hand saw has the right amount of flex and the bite you need to cut quickly and efficiently without clogging or binding.

MULTIPURPOSE - Use this versatile handsaw for trees and branches up to 12-inches in diameter as well as both wet and dry logs. Our wood cutting saw is great for manual pruning and cutting lumber, perfect for gardening or using on your next camping trip.
PRODUCT DETAILS - Materials: Alloy Steel and Wood. Dimensions: Blade - (L) 30”. Cross Cut Saw Recommended for Cutting Trees and Branches with 12-Inch Max Diameter. Color: Brown and Silver.
